attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it would be such a great way for me to interact with Mr. Trump and his already strong and growing campaign. I was meet with a laggy loading screen and a plethora of Bernie 2020 ads. Actually, I take it back. Although the app itself sucked and was a horrible way for Trump to spread his platform and messages the Bernie 2020 ads were appealing and calmed the soul. So in conclusion, refuse to re-elect Trump in November and vote for Biden!!!!
